text: Piyapan Choopetch () is a Thai film director and screenwriter. His films include Necromancer and Vow of Death. == Filmography == === Director === # Necromancer (Jom kha mung wej) (2005) # Vow of Death (Phii mai jim fun) (2007) # My Ex (Fan kao) (2009) # My Ex 2 : Haunted Lover (Fan mai) (2010) === Screenwriter === # Necromancer (Jom kha mung wej) (2005) (co-written with Kittikorn Liasirikun) ==External links== * Category:Thai film directors Category:Thai screenwriters Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Piyapan Choopetch
